author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:

title: I Didn't Want To Make This Video

author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Ensuring that your apps work with resizing is a pain and no one wants to deal with it, so I say, stop resizing my windows, they're not your windows, they're our windows.
